languages.text: All creatures in the area of effect must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies who have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or are outside the zone.
languages.original_text: Все существа в области действия должны пройти проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала они немедленно перемещаются из этой области, даже если {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}. При этом они могут получать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от союзников навигатора, которые прошли проверку или находятся вне зоны действия способности.

traits.locale_text: All units in a 3×3 zone must pass a Willpower resistance check, or immediately move out of it, even if they are stunned or immobilised. This movement triggers attacks of opportunity from allies that have passed the test or that are outside the zone.

All creatures in the area of effect must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies who have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or are outside the zone.

All creatures in the area of effect must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies who have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or are outside the zone.

All creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

All creatures in the area of effect must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies who have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or are outside the zone.

languages.text: Все существа в области действия должны пройти проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала они немедленно перемещаются из этой области, даже если {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}. При этом они могут получать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от союзников навигатора, которые прошли проверку или находятся вне зоны действия способности.
languages.original_text: All units in a 3×3 zone must pass a Willpower resistance test or immediately move out of the zone, even if they are stunned or immobilised. This movement triggers attacks of opportunity from the Navigator's allies that have passed the test or that are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Все существа в области 3×3 должны пройти проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала они немедленно перемещаются из этой области, даже если оглушены или обездвижены. При этом они могут получать атаки по возможности от союзников навигатора, которые прошли проверку или находятся вне зоны действия способности.

Все существа в области 3×3 должны пройти проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала они немедленно перемещаются из этой области, даже если оглушены или обездвижены. При этом они могут получать атаки по возможности от союзников навигатора, которые прошли проверку или находятся вне зоны действия способности.

languages.text: 效果区域内的所有生物需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若检定失败，则会立刻撤出这片区域，即便是处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人也会受到此效果影响。当敌人移动时，通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}的盟友，或是位于区域外的盟友会进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: All creatures in the area of effect must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies who have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: 效果区域内的所有生物需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若检定失败，则会立刻撤出这片区域，即便是处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人也会受到此效果影响。当敌人移动时，通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}的盟友，或是位于区域外的盟友会进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Todas las criaturas situadas en el área de efecto deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Voluntad para no salir inmediatamente de esa zona, incluso aunque estén {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizadas{/g}. Este movimiento provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} de los aliados del navegante que hayan superado la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} o estén fuera de la zona afectada.
languages.original_text: All creatures in the area of effect must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies who have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Todas las criaturas situadas en el área de efecto deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Voluntad para no salir inmediatamente de esa zona, incluso aunque estén {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizadas{/g}. Este movimiento provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} de los aliados del navegante que hayan superado la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} o estén fuera de la zona afectada.

languages.text: Alle Kreaturen in einer Zone müssen eine Willenskraft {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder verlassen umgehend die Zone. Dies ist auch dann der Fall, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}bewegungsunfähig{/g} sind. Diese Bewegung löst {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} der Verbündeten des Navigators aus, die die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestanden haben oder sich außerhalb der Zone befinden.
languages.original_text: All creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Alle Kreaturen im Wirkungsbereich müssen eine Willenskraft {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder verlassen umgehend die Zone. Dies ist auch dann der Fall, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}bewegungsunfähig{/g} sind. Diese Bewegung löst {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} der Verbündeten des Navigators aus, die die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestanden haben oder sich außerhalb der Zone befinden.

languages.text: Toutes les créatures présentes dans la zone d'effet doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Volonté ou quitter immédiatement la zone, même si elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}. Ce déplacement déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part des alliés du navigateur qui ont réussi le {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} ou qui se trouvent en dehors de la zone.
languages.original_text: All creatures in the area of effect must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies who have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les créatures présentes dans la zone d'effet doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Volonté ou quitter immédiatement la zone, même si elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}. Ce déplacement déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part des alliés du navigateur qui ont réussi le {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} ou qui se trouvent en dehors de la zone.

languages.text: 効果範囲内のすべての生物は{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならず、失敗した場合は{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}スタン{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}移動不可{/g}であっても即座にゾーンの外へ移動しなければならない。この移動は、抵抗判定に成功した、またはゾーン外にいる航宙士の仲間により、{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}機会攻撃{/g}を発動させる。
languages.original_text: All creatures in the area of effect must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies who have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: 効果範囲内のすべての生物は{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならず、失敗した場合は{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}スタン{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}移動不可{/g}であっても即座にゾーンの外へ移動しなければならない。この移動は、抵抗判定に成功した、またはゾーン外にいる航宙士の仲間により、{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}機会攻撃{/g}を発動させる。
